title: Content rationale / strategy
subHeader: Design content with a clear structure and make sure it aligns to a validated user need.

guidance.guidanceText01: Define content/screen/page goal that explains why it's needed. This approach helps to identify legacy/outdated content that is redundant or doesn't meet a user need.

carbonImpact.impactText01: Lighter pages require less energy from servers to host and improve the user's experience by culling any unnecessary content or steps in the user's journey.

measures.measuresText01: Page weight - set at the beginning of a project and use as a measure of success with the goal being to deliver each key page in less than the budget/limit? Useful benchmark for team as they iterate designs
